channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1536887896778629120
item.description:
SE INSTALA LA RED ESTATAL DE DATOS ABIERTOS DE OAXACA (REDA OAXACA)
●La REDA Oaxaca trabajará de manera colaborativa para implementación del Reto de Apertura Infraestructura Abierta 2022, referente internacional para elevar los estándares de datos abiertos a nivel internacional https://t.co/836BuFdTlB

item.title: #en @ 1536866848826101762
item.description:
Kudos to @UniSouthPacific + its students for having clearly demonstrated today the values of open data & #RightToInformation through their innovative digital tools 👏
The bar has now been set higher, with commitment 4 more knowledge + action 🎈
#UKPacificPartnership #PacificAct https://t.co/2cuC0bXZNS

item.title: #es @ 1536818406615306242
item.description:
📌#Oaxaca ha demostrado estar en la primera línea de la #Transparencia😱
Con la coordinación del @OGAIP_Oaxaca, se instaló la #REDA para la implementación de los Estándares en #InfraestructuraAbierta🏗🥳👏
¡Seguiremos avanzando en materia de #DatosAbiertos!🔓👩‍💻👨‍💻💪 https://t.co/Ut8rJ3ORYa

item.title: #es @ 1536818392178601986
item.description: Hoy nuestra secretaria técnica @afhierro participó en un panel sobre la función de los datos abiertos para el monitoreo y evaluación de las instancias de gobierno. Agradecemos a la @SIGAMonterrey y al @mtygob por la invitación a este espacio. https://t.co/Tt5MvvfYxC

item.title: #es @ 1536797748510482434
item.description: Pensando en la crisis hídrica que vivimos hace unos meses hice este mapa con información de los datos abiertos del programa "Cosecha de Lluvia" en los hogares. item.title: #en @ 1536773903070248962
item.description:
Whoa, I did not realized the @SunFoundation closed down in the middle of the pandemic
This is, I think, indicative of the initial promise of open data and a transparent & connected world and how that hope has ultimately failed
https://t.co/Or1ALZhWgw

item.title: #en @ 1536699824841580545
item.description: "Open data usually serves different purposes for different audiences. item.title: #en @ 1536694978591657985
item.description:
Do you know #OpenDataPortals across Europe with sections showing:

item.title: #en @ 1536606677478301698
item.description:
As always, none of this would be possible without true #opendata sharing, and we're incredibly grateful to labs around the world who've made their data available so quickly and openly. 🙏🏻
See how to download curated seqs & metadata from our github: https://t.co/6HVSQbzWQk
4/4

item.title: #en @ 1536606666396942336
item.description:
Thanks to #opendata sharing from groups around the world, we've updated our #monkeypox builds to reflect the new, non-geographical clade names.
We also now have two builds to highlight two different overview levels: a complete phylogeny and a zoomed view.
1/4 https://t.co/AEzb6Jiim7

item.description: I'm living close to Zurich Airport, watching the airplanes landing or taking off on/from runway 34. I wrote a node for @NodeRED consuming data from @OpenSkyNetwork. item.title: #en @ 1536436609779998722
item.description:
Most award talks are bland, boring, or both.
This is not that kind of talk.
Pat's talk is chock-full of insightful comments on everything from Open Data to microbiome analysis fundamentals to the real-time impact of research on patients.
Worth 22 min of your time. Really. https://t.co/4JUi0NYTHb

item.title: #en @ 1536380109678120960
item.description: @BrunaLab @DanielBolnick @Biotropica Strong agree. "Open data" should not mean "you have to give it away to anyone who can analyze it faster, right away, no matter how much sweat and tears and $ you put into it". That's a recipe for big extractive labs that parasitize field work.

#DYK?
Several online tools and apps use #Copernicus #OpenData
